full_summary:
===============

Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) – Request for Supply Arrangement
=====================================================================

**Reference Number:** CB-8500-8733045
**Solicitation Number:** E60ZT-16TSSB-E
**Publication Date:** August 25, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 4, 2028, 3:00 PM Eastern Time

**Overview**
------------

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites qualified suppliers to submit their proposals for the provision of non-IT related solution-based professional services. This request for supply arrangement (RFSA) is open to all qualified suppliers who can provide the required services as per the terms and conditions outlined in this document.

**Services Required**
-------------------

The services required under this RFSA include management advisory services and business administration services, as per the UN/CEFACT Code *80100000 and *80160000, respectively. The services will be delivered to various locations throughout Canada, excluding areas subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.

**Key Dates**
-------------

* The RFSA is open for responses until July 4, 2028, at 3:00 PM Eastern Time.
* Suppliers are encouraged to submit their proposals early to allow for processing and evaluation.

**Suppliers must ensure they comply with the following requirements:**

* Enroll and establish an account in the Supplier Module of the PWGSC Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS) e-Portal.
* Access the Supplier Module e-Portal application as specified in the RFSA document.
* Submit their proposal through the CPSS e-Portal Supplier Module by the closing date and time.
* Submit the supporting documentation via email upon request by Canada (paperless bid submission process).

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

This RFSA is subject to the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business and may be designated as set-aside under this program. Suppliers must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Julie C. Morin
PWGSC
(343) 576-8807
Julie.Morin3@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**
---------------

None available.

**Attachments**
----------------

The RFSA document is available for download from the following URL: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8500/e60zt-16tssb-e-2022-05-03.zip
